definition: to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: In Britain the transport of milk has increased 30-fold since 1980.
sentences.chinese: 1980年至今，英國的牛奶運輸量增加了30倍。

sentences.english: The amount of freight transported by motor carriers has steadily increased over the years.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，汽運承擔的運輸量持續穩步地上升。

sentences.english: Delays on the river are declining partly due to less traffic.
sentences.chinese: 河運延誤的情況在一定程度上因運輸量下降而減少。

sentences.english: Permeable pavement is not very good for roads with a lot of traffic.
sentences.chinese: 可滲透的路面對高運輸量的馬路並不有效。

sentences.english: A trainload more may soon be on the way.
sentences.chinese: 承載更多運輸量的列車即將出現。

sentences.english: Permiable(Permeable) pavement is not very good for roads with a lot of traffic.
sentences.chinese: 可滲透的路面對高運輸量的馬路並不有效。
